column4: Hi all, is there a way i can share wireless from my laptop to my boyfriends laptop? (wifi to wifi card) we dont have a router
you should be able to use ad-hoc wireless

Yeah, I thought so ^^; so I went to WicD and hit "Create Ad-Hoc". It had an IP number in there, I gave it the name XMAS,  and I didnt want security so I clicked ok.... Then it says 'Connected to XMAS at 0%" on *MY* laptop  LOL
